query:
SELECT 
  propertyType,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  AVG(priceYen) as avgPrice,
  MIN(priceYen) as minPrice,
  MAX(priceYen) as maxPrice
FROM transactions 
WHERE prefecture = '東京都' 
  AND (city LIKE '%小平%' OR district LIKE '%小平%')
GROUP BY propertyType;
